creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: horned figure with red skin seated, kicking legs up into air; white, bulbous glass eyes; broad, open smile revealing small, pointed teeth; carries drum stick in PR hand; oval "halo" of drums behind figure; black sash with floral decorations loosely wrapped behind figure; base
medium: Wood with polychrome and inlaid glass; metal
title: God of Thunder
